name: CHAT_2
description:
I just got home from a nice business trip, thinking about jumping on the ol' computer and diving into some CHAT rooms to see where the night takes me before 6 AM. Got a long shift coming up, unfortunately.

Everything seems normal, or is it?

===========================================================

CHAT_2, is a far upgrade from CHAT_1. 3D graphics, computer realism, in-depth terminal action, and more!

== WEB GL Build Coming Soon [ Sorry for inconveniences! ] ==
